extraction_method: pdfplumber table extraction + custom CID number decoding + manual municipality name mapping
parties_found: 減税日本・ゆうこく連合
notes: 39 municipalities (12 cities + 15 towns + 12 villages). PDF used non-standard CID font encoding; numbers decoded via cross-referencing with Nara City website data. Municipality names mapped by structural position in PDF tables. 奈良市 has 2 開票区 (第１/第２) but was aggregated to city level. 安楽死制度を考える会 ran in 近畿ブロック but not listed in prefecture data.
